author: Author
copy_success_1: Image link has been automatically copied to the system clipboard

config_page.placeholder_4: Please enter the name of the new directory...
config_page.message_2: Failed to retrieve user information. Please check if the Token is correct
config_page.message_3: Auto-creation of GitHub repository failed. Please try again later
config_page.message_8: Please select a directory in the repository
config_page.message_9: Failed to retrieve repository information. Please try again later
config_page.date_dir_tip: Automatically create directories in the format yyyyMMdd

img_name.title: Image Name Settings
img_name.hash_switch_desc: Automatically adds a hash code to the image name before uploading to ensure uniqueness. Highly recommended to enable.
img_name.prefix_switch_desc: Automatically adds a prefix to the image name before uploading, e.g., abc-image.jpg, where abc- is the prefix.

img_watermark.title: Image Watermark Settings
img_watermark.switch_desc: When enabled, you can customize watermark text, font size, position, color, and opacity.

img_compress.title: Image Compression Settings
img_compress.switch_desc: When enabled, images will be automatically compressed before uploading, effectively reducing upload and load times. Highly recommended to enable.
img_compress.radio_1_desc: Compressed images will be in webp format, with a high compression ratio supported by most browsers.
img_compress.radio_2_desc: Compressed images will be in jpg format, providing the best compatibility with all browsers.
img_compress.radio_3_desc: Compressed images will be in avif format, with an extremely high compression ratio supported by some modern browsers.

link_rule.title: Image Link Rule Configuration
link_rule.input_name_1_rule: Image link type name cannot be empty
link_rule.input_name_2_rule: Image link rule cannot be empty
link_rule.error_msg_1: Failed to add. This image link rule already exists.
link_rule.error_msg_2: Failed to {action}. Image link rule must include {path}.
link_rule.error_msg_3: Image link rule is missing {rules}. Confirm {action}?

link_format.title: Image Link Format Settings
link_format.switch_desc: Copy-pasted image links will be automatically converted to {type} format after successful upload.
link_format.delete_tips: This action will permanently delete the image link rule.

image_hosting_deploy.title: Image Hosting Deployment
image_hosting_deploy.fail2: Deployment failed. Please try again later.
image_hosting_deploy.deploying: Deploying to GitHub Pages, this process takes about 1 minute, please be patient...

cloud_settings.tip_1: Your settings data has not been saved to the cloud repository. Would you like to save now?
cloud_settings.tip_2: Settings files found in your cloud repository. Would you like to use them?
cloud_settings.tip_3: Changes detected in your settings data. Would you like to sync with the cloud repository?
cloud_settings.tip_4: Local and cloud repository settings data are consistent.

upload_page.upload_area_text: Drag / Paste / Click here to select images
upload_page.message1: Please complete the image bed configuration first
upload_page.message4: Please select the images to upload
upload_page.message7: Upload failed, please try again later

management_page.reload: Reload all data in the {dir} directory
management_page.toNextDir: Double-click to enter the next level directory
management_page.delTips: This action will permanently delete the image
management_page.delTips2: Selected {total} images, do you want to delete them in batch?
management_page.message2: No changes in the image name
management_page.message7: Deletion failed, please try again later
management_page.contextmenu_1: Upload new images from the current location

toolbox.tool_1_desc: 不限制图片大小和数量，不上传至服务器的离线极致压缩
toolbox.tool_2_desc: 不限制图片大小和数量，在线转换成 Base64 编码
toolbox.tool_3_desc: 自定义水印文字、字体大小、位置、颜色和透明度
toolbox.copy_base64: 点击复制 Base64 编码

feedback.text_1: PicX is an image hosting tool developed based on the GitHub API, providing services for image upload hosting, generating image links, and common image tools.
feedback.text_2: It is recommended to add this site to your browser bookmarks for convenient use in the future.
feedback.text_3: If PicX is helpful to you, feel free to appreciate the author and support open source.
feedback.text_4: Disclaimer: Do not use PicX to upload images that violate local laws. The author is not responsible for any consequences.

toggle_language_msg: Detected that your IP belongs to {region}. Do you want to switch to {language}?

authorization.msg_1: GitHub OAuth authorization has expired. Please reauthorize.
authorization.msg_2: PicX APP is not installed on GitHub, no operational permissions currently.
authorization.msg_3: PicX GitHub APP installed successfully. Would you like to authorize and log in?
authorization.msg_4: Authorization failed. Please try again later.
authorization.text_3: Logging in using GitHub OAuth Authorization
authorization.text_4: GitHub Token has expired. Please reauthorize login.
authorization.text_8: GitHub OAuth Authorization Login requires PicX GitHub APP installation.
authorization.text_9: Login with GitHub Token requires generating a Token with operational permissions.
